title: Elegant Navratna-Inspired Necklace with Emerald Accents
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features genuine Rubies
features: This modern take on the classic Navratna (nine gems) concept features a delicate gold setting embellished with rubies along the chain, leading to a striking pendant section. The pendant showcases five vibrant green emeralds, expertly set in bezel settings. The spaces in between the emeralds are filled with intricate cubic zirconia pave, creating a mesmerizing sparkle. Small, spherical gold dangles add a touch of movement and playfulness. The design has an open, airy feel, making it comfortable to wear.
colors: and brilliant white (from the CZs). This classic color palette is considered auspicious and adds to the piece's timeless appeal.
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali or Sankranthi
or even to elevate everyday style. This versatile piece can be paired with both traditional sarees and contemporary outfits.
description: This necklace is a perfect blend of tradition and modern aesthetics. The genuine gemstones and high-quality CZs create a luxurious look without the heavy price tag of traditional Navratna. The intricate gold work and Hyderabadi polish enhance its beauty and ensure lasting shine. Itâ€™s a statement piece that will turn heads and become a cherished heirloom.
